processing_structure.text: Comment: Input: one integer, Output: sum of its divisors
Step 3: Loop from 1 to the input value

advice.text: You already wrote clear top-level steps; this means you can move to coding now. Start by implementing the first comment: reading the input.
Decide a variable name to hold the input and how you'll read an integer from standard input before using it in the loop.
Declare an int variable, use the standard input function to store the user's number into it, then continue by initializing the sum and writing the for-loop; test the program after input is working.
